text.9_Chapter, 14_Verse, 0_Comment: The rich man's wealth is like a fortress that will save him from moments of troubles even though he is not wise; and “the poor” i.e., the heartless, their poverty will ruin them.
text.13_Chapter, 34_Verse, 0_Comment: רצון - (no actual comment is found in hard copy, only the opening word.)
